summary: This is a memorandum dated August 11, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent from an unspecified sender to an unspecified recipient. It references an attached document and includes the address for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held. The document appears to be related to administrative or procedural matters concerning Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the memorandum; the document is about him and references the correctional center where he was held.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum dated August 11, 2019, specifically concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
It references an attached document, but the content of that attachment is not provided in the given text.
It includes the address for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was incarcerated at the time.
The correspondence suggests ongoing administrative or procedural activities related to Epstein's case around the time of his death in August 2019.
